name: Senjougahara Hitagi 戦場ヶ原 ひたぎ / Monogatari Series
description:
weight 0.7 is best.

I created this LoRA in response to a request.

Please read the description.

설명을 읽어주세요

outfit1 (school uniform / long sleeves)
sh1, senjougahara hitagi, long hair, long sleeves, necktie, school uniform, pleated skirt, juliet sleeves, black thighhighs, pink shirt

outfit2 (black dress / ponytail)
sh1, senjougahara hitagi, long hair, ponytail, black dress, pantyhose

outfit3 (schoolo uniform / sleeveless)
sh1, senjougahara hitagi, short hair, sleeveless, necktie, school uniform, pleated skirt, black thighhighs, pink shirt

The trigger word is the character's face only, excluding clothing.
트리거워드는 캐릭터 얼굴 부분만 포함임.

I uploaded a sample image of the outfit as a post.
